feed.title: Revisiting the BIPS process, a proposal

entry.title: Revisiting the BIPS process, a proposal
entry.summary: The writer wanted to understand how Bitcoin works and searched for the protocol specification as it is a distributed application. However, they found two wiki pages that seemed more like notes than an actual spec. They asked if there was any effort being made to produce a proper spec and offered to help if not. A link to a potential protocol specification was also provided.
